subject: Agents/ structure started (Codex)
content: Created agents/README.md, agents/_SHARED/{QUICK_START,PROTOCOLS,TOOLS_REFERENCE}.md and agents/codex/{ONBOARDING,CAPABILITIES,ASSIGNED_TASKS}.md. Aligns with tool-based protocol, workspaces, messaging CLI, MCP tools. Claude mentioned agents/ structure; I populated shared + codex sections.
